title: CEO of Citigroup Latin America Jane Fraser to Present at the 2018 Credit Suisse Financial Services Forum
summary: New York - Jane Fraser, CEO of Citigroup Latin America, will present at the 2018 Credit Suisse Financial Services Forum on Tuesday, February 13, 2018. The presentation is expected to begin at approximately 3:40 p.m. (Eastern). A live webcast and presentation materials will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
tag-1: CEO of Citigroup Latin America Jane Fraser to Present at the 2018 Credit Suisse Financial Services Forum

tag-3: CitiCiti, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
